trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Windows.Forms.Layout" /> namespace contains classes for implementing layout behaviors in your form or control.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.Windows.Forms.Layout" /> contém classes para implementar comportamentos de layout no seu formulário ou controle.

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the classes included in this namespace:
trans-unit.target: A lista a seguir mostra as classes incluídas nesse namespace:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine> abstract base class is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> controls for building custom layout engines.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine> classe base abstrata é usada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> controles para a criação de mecanismos de layout personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection> class collects objects that participate in a layout managed by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection> classe coleta objetos que participam de um layout gerenciado por um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine>.
